div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1600 Golan (anc. Gaulanitis or Trachoni- tis), 1932 Burial: c. 125 B.C. (Westermark) Contents: 7 AR (all pl.) Antiochus VII: 4 tetradr. (Tyre) Demetrius II, 2nd reign: 3 tetradr. (Tyre) Disposition: dispersed Seyrig, Tr√©sors du Levant (in press). Latest date 185 S.E.
